verses.verse: <S%H8104>Keep<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> you <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and be <S%H7138>more<s%> <S%H7138>ready<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%> than to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H3684>fools:<s%> for they <S%H3045>consider<s%> not that they <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Be not <S%H926>rash<s%> with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and let not your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H4116>hasty<s%> to <S%H3318>utter<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God:<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and you on <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> let your <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H4592>few.<s%>

For a <S%H2472>dream<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> through the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6045>business;<s%> and a <S%H3684>fool's<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> is known by <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H1697>words.<s%>

<S%H834>When<s%> you <S%H5087>vow<s%> a <S%H5088>vow<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H309>defer<s%> not to <S%H7999>pay<s%> it; for he has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in <S%H3684>fools:<s%> <S%H7999>pay<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5087>vowed.<s%>
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is it that you should not <S%H5087>vow,<s%> than that you should <S%H5087>vow<s%> and not <S%H7999>pay.<s%>

<S%H5414>Suffer<s%> not your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to cause your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H2398>sin;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel,<s%> that it was an <S%H7684>error:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H7107>angry<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H2254>destroy<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands?<s%>
For in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H2472>dreams<s%> and <S%H7230>many<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> there are also divers <S%H1892>vanities:<s%> but <S%H3372>fear<s%> you <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6233>oppression<s%> of the <S%H7326>poor,<s%> and <S%H1499>violent<s%> perverting of <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and <S%H6664>justice<s%> in a <S%H4082>province,<s%> <S%H8539>marvel<s%> not <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H2656>matter:<s%> for he that is <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> the <S%H1364>highest<s%> <S%H8104>regards;<s%> and there be <S%H1364>higher<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> they.
Moreover the <S%H3504>profit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> is for <S%H3605>all:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> himself is <S%H5647>served<s%> by the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

He that <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> shall not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3701>silver;<s%> nor he that <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H1995>abundance<s%> with <S%H8393>increase:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

When <S%H2896>goods<s%> <S%H7235>increase,<s%> they are <S%H7231>increased<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> them: and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3788>good<s%> is there to the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof, <S%H518>saving<s%> the <S%H7200>beholding<s%> of them with their <S%H5869>eyes?<s%>

The <S%H8142>sleep<s%> of a <S%H5647>laboring<s%> man is <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> he <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> or <S%H7235>much:<s%> but the <S%H7647>abundance<s%> of the <S%H6223>rich<s%> will not <S%H3240>suffer<s%> him to <S%H3462>sleep.<s%>

There is a <S%H2470>sore<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> namely, <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> for the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof to their <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>

But <S%H1931>those<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> by <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6045>travail:<s%> and he <S%H3205>begets<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

As he <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> of his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H990>womb,<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> shall he <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> of his <S%H5999>labor,<s%> which he may <S%H3212>carry<s%> away in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H2090>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is a <S%H2470>sore<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> that in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5980>points<s%> as he <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall he <S%H3212>go:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3504>profit<s%> has he that has <S%H5998>labored<s%> for the <S%H7307>wind?<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> he <S%H398>eats<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and he has <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3708>sorrow<s%> and <S%H7110>wrath<s%> with his <S%H2483>sickness.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen:<s%> it is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3303>comely<s%> for one to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and to <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor<s%> that he <S%H5998>takes<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H4557>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> him: for it is his <S%H2506>portion.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H5233>wealth,<s%> and has given him <S%H7980>power<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, and to <S%H5375>take<s%> his <S%H2506>portion,<s%> and to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his <S%H5999>labor;<s%> <S%H2090>this<s%> is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

For he shall not <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answers<s%> him in the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
